title: The Planets
brief_description: This documentary series gives a comprehensive and spectacular account of space exploration and discovery. It employs a unique blend of state-of-the-art computer graphics together with previously unseen space-race archive, as well as first-hand testimony from scientists around the world. Narrated by Samuel West. Includes the brilliant musical score, “The Planets,” by Gustav Holst. Parts include: Terra Firma, Giants, Moon, Star, Atmosphere, Life, and Destiny.
